name.en: Introduction to Chemical Engineering and Computer Calculations

department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

goal.en: "This course introduces the priciple of chemical engineering calculation by the fundamentals of material and energy balances. Through defining problems, collecting data, analyzing the data, students will learn how to effectively solve problems"
goal.ch: "本課程主要目標為介紹化工系學生在化學工程上所用的原理與計算技巧, 重點在能量平衡, 如何列出式子並解之."

content.en:
"Ch 1. Introduction
Ch 2. Process Units and Degree of Freedom Analysis
Ch 3. Material Balance on Single-Unit Process
Ch 4. Multiunit Process Calculations
Ch 5. Material Balances on Reactive Systems
Ch 6. Multiple-Unit Systems Involving Reaction, Recycle, and Purge
Ch 7. Single- and Multiphase Systems
Ch 8. Energy and Energy Balances
